label: ham
subject: Re: [R] if/else construct
body: 75 (return) [ Personal satire was condemned by the laws of the twelve tables: Si male condiderit in quem quis carmina, jus est JudiciumqueÑHorat. Sat. ii. 1. 82. ÑÑJulian (in Misopogon, p. 337) owns himself subject to the law; and the AbbŽ de la Bleterie (Hist. de Jovien, tom. ii. p. 92) has eagerly embraced a declaration so agreeable to his own system, and, indeed, to the true spirit of the Imperial constitution.]
